attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We already pay a hefty ROAD TAX, and a ridiculously high amount of tax on our petrol and diesel, and now you want to bring in road tolls, congestion charges and a "tax per mile" black-box in our vehicles.

This MUST STOP NOW - the motorist is being unfairly targeted and the money NOT being spent on new roads etc and therefore this is unacceptable.

In rural areas such as the South West, we do not have suitable public transport and NEED our cars.

Ross Hemsworth
Net Talk Radio

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Cease over-taxing the motorist."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11205.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/CarTaxation/
